message: "Hi doc, just wanted to update you on my insulin intake. At 7:00 AM, I took 10 units of Lantus as my basal dose. Then, with lunch at 12:30 PM, I administered 15 units of Novolog as a bolus dose. My current blood sugar level is 150 mg/dL. Let me know if there are any adjustments you recommend. Thanks!"
"Hi there, it's 9:26 AM and my blood glucose level is 135 mg/dL right now. I had breakfast about an hour ago."
